pathirana kahawaththa  rasayen da anuna gunayen da anuna obe gi gangula apa sith sanahalamin ada da gala yayi jothipalayaneni guna gi warusa kotharam gayuwa da oba yali apa atharata enne natha enamudu ithiri kala giya handama apata athiya thawa kalpa kalantharayak yanathurudharma eekanayaka mathale  hadawatha raththaran jothi gayu githa mihirathi edath adath hetath apawa sanasana maha pahan tambaaki jothi manjula perera pahala katuneriyathilakarathna wilwala kagalla  sinhala sinamawe diyunuwata jothigen lada pannaraya wachanawalin kiya nima kala nohakiya.

krikat loka kusalana tharagawaliye jayagrahanaya udesa basnahira palath sabhawa magin pa gamanak sanwidhanaya kara atha.dasadahasakata adhika pirisak sahabhagi wana me pa gamana labana 15 wanida pa. wa. 3.00 ta palath pradhana amathya karyalaya (shrawasthiya) asalin aarambha wi shri lanka krikat aayathanaya dakwa gaman kirimata niyamithaya.medina shri lankawa ha batahira indiya kodew kandayama athara kheththarama krikat kridanganayedi puhunu tharagayak pawathwena bawin me pagamana maradana aananda widuhal kridanganaye sita kheththarama kridanganaya dakwa gaman kala yuthu bawata thawath yojanawak da idiripathwa atha.kese wuwada loka kusalana jayagrahanaya wenuwen basnahira palath sabhawa widhimath wadapiliwelak sanwidhanaya kirimata piyawara gatha yuthu yayi pradhana amathi prasanna ranathunga mahatha pawasiya.loka kusalana jayagrahanaya udesa pawathwena pa gamana pilibanda raswimak eeye shrawasthiyedi pawathi athara eyata palath krida amathi upali kodikara mahatha athulu niladharihu pirisak ekwuha.basnahira palath sabhawe siyalu amathyansha, departhamenthu ha pasal krikat kandayamwala samajikayan me pagamanata sahabhagi wimata niyamithaya..
